      • Graph

        public Graph(int numVertices,
             boolean isDirected)
        Constructs a new graph based on the number of desired vertices
        Parameters:
        numVertices - number of vertices to be included in the new graph
        isDirected - if the graph is directed or not

    • Method Detail

      • DFS

        public void DFS(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> traversal,
                int startingValue,
                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> visited)
        Conducts a DFS of a graph from a given starting vertex. Saves the DFS to the given stack
        Parameters:
        traversal - the stack to save the DFS to
        startingValue - the vertex to start the DFS with
        visited - an array of visited verticies
